snippet: Just a prank? In the age of the Internet and viral video, gags can be intensely magnified.
abstract: Loose Ends column by writer and television host Peter Funt reflects on pranks, in light of apparent suicide of British nurse Jacintha Saldanha after she was fooled by Australian radio hosts into putting through call to nurse caring for Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge.
lead_paragraph: Just a prank? In the age of the Internet and viral video, gags can be intensely magnified.
